reporting_and_analytics.description: Tracks the health and resilience of ecosystems.
Monitors the variety of life forms.
Reports on the balance of atmospheric gases.
Tracks the abundance of essential resources.
Reports on the progress of civilization.

process_end_conditions: The world operates autonomously and sustains intelligent life without intervention.

critical_success_factors.name: Balanced Ecosystem Development
critical_success_factors.description: Creation of interdependent and stable ecosystems.

critical_success_factors.name: Sustainable Resource Management
critical_success_factors.description: Efficient use and regeneration of resources.
Development of a self-sustaining and ethical civilization.
critical_success_factors.name: Successful Emergence of Intelligent Life

process_steps.description: Define world parameters (size, shape, environment). Design fundamental laws of physics and chemistry. Plan initial geological features and atmospheric composition.
process_steps.purpose: To establish the foundational elements of the world.
process_steps.scope: Defining the basic rules and structure of the world.
success_criteria: Functional and stable laws of physics and chemistry

change_management.versioning_rules: Major changes require complete world reset

process_end_conditions: Foundational elements are defined and ready for implementation
Physical structure of the world is complete
process_steps.description: Simulate tectonic activity. Establish continents, oceans, and landforms. Introduce essential minerals and resources.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Careful simulation and adjustment of geological parameters

process_steps.purpose: To create the physical structure of the world.
process_steps.scope: Building the planet's landmasses and resource base.
Developing the planet's atmosphere and water systems.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Simulation and adjustment of climate parameters

process_steps.description: Create atmospheric composition suitable for life. Establish water cycle (evaporation, condensation, precipitation). Simulate weather patterns and climate zones.
process_steps.purpose: To create an environment conducive to life.

change_management.versioning_rules: Record all atmospheric and hydrological changes

process_end_conditions: Atmosphere and water systems are stable and functional
governance_requirements: Adherence to chemical and physical laws

step_risks_and_controls.control: Implement redundancy in species and resource distribution

success_criteria: Functional food chains and nutrient cycles
process_steps.description: Introduce basic life forms (bacteria, algae). Simulate evolutionary processes. Establish food chains and nutrient cycles.
process_steps.scope: Introducing basic life and setting up evolutionary mechanisms.
process_steps.purpose: To establish the foundation for life on the world.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Careful monitoring of species populations and resource levels

change_management.versioning_rules: Track species changes and ecosystem impacts

process_steps.description: Introduce diverse plant and animal species. Simulate species interaction and adaptation. Monitor ecosystem stability.
governance_requirements: Ethical guidelines for species introduction and protection
process_steps.scope: Expanding the variety of life and ensuring ecosystem health.
process_steps.purpose: To increase the complexity and resilience of the world's ecosystems.

process_steps.scope: Guiding the evolution of intelligent life from basic organisms.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Guidance towards sustainable practices, ethical guidelines, resource management education, and conflict resolution mechanisms

process_steps.description: Guide the evolution of intelligent life forms. Establish cognitive abilities and social structures. Monitor technological advancement.
process_end_conditions: Intelligent civilization is established and advancing
governance_requirements: Ethical guidelines for intelligent life development
process_steps.purpose: To foster the development of intelligent life capable of self-governance.

change_management.versioning_rules: Monitor the impact of changes on civilization

process_end_conditions: World is environmentally stable and resource-rich
process_steps.scope: Adjusting world parameters to promote sustainability.

change_management.versioning_rules: Monitor the long-term impact of changes

process_steps.description: Fine-tune environmental parameters. Address imbalances and resource depletion. Ensure long-term sustainability.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Implement feedback loops and regulatory mechanisms

governance_requirements: Environmental regulations and resource management policies
process_steps.purpose: To ensure the long-term viability of the world and its inhabitants.

governance_requirements: Ethical guidelines for observation without intervention

step_risks_and_controls.control: No direct intervention, but ensure intelligent life has access to data and predictive models to understand and mitigate potential collapse scenarios

process_steps.purpose: To allow the world to operate independently and foster the growth of intelligent life.
process_steps.scope: Observing the long-term evolution of the world without intervention.
process_end_conditions: The world operates autonomously and sustains intelligent life without intervention

change_management.versioning_rules: Record observations and potential future interventions (if necessary)

process_steps.description: Remove creator intervention. Monitor world performance and evolution. Observe the development of intelligent civilization.

metrics.description: Measure of the balance and resilience of ecosystems.
metrics.name: Ecosystem Stability

metrics.description: Measure of the variety of life forms in the world.
metrics.name: Biodiversity Index

metrics.description: Measure of the balance of gases in the atmosphere.
metrics.name: Atmospheric Composition
Resource Availability
metrics.description: Measure of the abundance of essential resources.
metrics.target: Sufficient resource levels for all life forms

metrics.name: Emergence of Intelligent Life
metrics.description: Measure of the progress of intelligent life development.

change_management.change_request_process: Controlled introduction of new species or technologies
change_management.versioning_rules: Environmental impact assessment for significant changes, Adaptive adjustments to natural laws based on observation

improvement_inputs: Learning from evolutionary successes and failures
Adapting to the needs of intelligent life
continuous_improvement.review_frequency: Monitoring ecosystem performance and adjusting parameters

critical_failure_factors.description: Loss of biodiversity and ecosystem function.
critical_failure_factors.name: Ecosystem Collapse

critical_failure_factors.description: Inability to foster a self-sustaining civilization.
critical_failure_factors.name: Failure to Develop Intelligent Life
Dependence on Creator Intervention
critical_failure_factors.description: World requires constant monitoring and adjustment.

system_requirements.details: Software capable of simulating geological, atmospheric, and biological processes.
system_requirements.name: World Simulation Engine
Resource Management System
system_requirements.details: System for tracking and managing resource distribution and consumption.
Algorithm for simulating evolutionary processes and species development.
system_requirements.name: Evolutionary Algorithm
Environmental Monitoring Tools
system_requirements.details: Sensors and systems for monitoring environmental conditions.

system_requirements.name: Intelligent Life AI
system_requirements.details: AI for simulating the behavior and development of intelligent life.

governance_requirements: Divine oversight of initial conditions and natural laws
Periodic monitoring of key metrics (ecosystem health, resource levels)
Ethical guidelines for intelligent life development
scope: The creation of a planet from initial conceptualization to a self-sustaining ecosystem with intelligent life.
purpose: To create a viable, self-sustaining world capable of supporting and fostering intelligent life.

risks_and_controls.control: Implement redundancy in species and resource distribution
Implement resource regeneration and sustainable consumption mechanisms
Implement climate regulation systems and feedback loops

responsibilities: Participating in food chains and nutrient cycles

introduction: A detailed process for creating a self-sustaining world capable of fostering intelligent life within one month.
assumptions: Life will adapt to environmental conditions
Intelligent life will emerge given suitable conditions
